title: 72-Hour Cold Ferment NY-Style Pizza Dough
steps: Mix flour, water, yeast, salt, sugar, and olive oil until dough forms
Knead dough for 10-12 minutes until smooth and elastic
Divide dough into three balls (two 600g, one 650g)
Place in airtight container and refrigerate for 48-72 hours for cold ferment
Remove from fridge 1-2 hours before baking
Preheat oven with pizza stone under broil setting
Stretch dough by hand, add toppings, and bake for 7 minutes
